member.summary: Owner control.

member.summary: Number of images.

member.summary: Get a string property using its ViewState ID.

member.summary: Set string property value using its ViewState ID.

member.name: M:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.ToString
member.summary: String formatted for visual designer.

member.name: M:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.Reset
member.summary: Reset all properties to thier defaults.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.RenderingType
member.summary: Type of rendering logic that is used to create rounded corners around button.

remarks.p:
Warnings:
If FileImages is used (which is automatically enabled with all defaults), when Internet Explorer 6 may fail to load, background images and buttons becomes transparent. That problem can not be fixed by WebImageButton.
If BordersByTableCells is used and a particular browser fails to create a TD-html-element with the size of 1x1 pixels, then borders of button can be distorted and have increased width.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.MaxWidth
member.summary: Maximum allowed width of the control.
member.remarks: That property has effect only if ImageFiles is used and the Width of control in set in %. It prevents breaking background image on separate parts when width of control becomes too large.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.MaxHeight
member.summary: Maximum allowed height of the control.
member.remarks: That property has effect only if ImageFiles is used and Height of control in set in %. It prevents breaking background image on separate parts when height of control becomes too large.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.WidthOfRightEdge
member.summary: Width of the rectangle on the right side of a control that is used to render the right edge of a background image.
member.remarks:
The larger the radius of the edges of a background image, the larger the value of that property should be.
That area can not contain text or image, so it is similar to the right-padding.
If this property is set to 0, then the width of control is defined by the value of the MaxWidth property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.HeightOfBottomEdge
member.summary: Height of a rectangle on the bottom side of a control that is used to render the bottom edge of a background image.
member.remarks:
The larger the radius of the edges of a background image, the larger the value of this property should be.
That area can not contain text or an image, so, it is similar to the bottom-padding.
If this property is set to 0, then the height of the control is defined by the value of the MaxHeight property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.ImageUrl
member.summary: Url for the background image that is used for the control in the normal state.
member.remarks: This property has effect only when the RenderingType is set to the FileImages (background images are used).

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.HoverImageUrl
member.summary: Url for the background image that is used when the mouse is moved over a control.
member.remarks: That property has effect only when RenderingType is set to the FileImages and ImageUrl is set.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.FocusImageUrl
member.summary: Url for the background image that is used when a control has input focus and the mouse is outside of the bounds of the control.
member.remarks: This property has effect only when RenderingType is set to the FileImages and ImageUrl is set.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.PressedImageUrl
member.summary: Url for the background image that is used when control is in a pressed state (set by mouse or by action key).
member.remarks: That property has effect only when RenderingType is set to the FileImages and ImageUrl is set.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCorners.DisabledImageUrl
member.summary: Url for the background image that is used for a disabled control.
member.remarks: That property has effect only when RenderingType is set to the FileImages and ImageUrl is set.

member.name: T:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.InvalidValueType
member.summary: Type of error that is raised when invalid-value event was fired.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.InvalidValueType.Invalid
member.summary:
Invalid string which could not be converted to a valid value.
In case of WebNumericEdit it is fired when the following strings were entered: ".", "-.", "-".
In the case of WebDateTimeEdit, the last good date value was used as the new value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.InvalidValueType.MinMaxLimit
member.summary: Entered value was beyond minimum or maximum limits.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.InvalidValueType.FieldValue
member.summary:
Wrong values of fields, missing field value, etc.
In the case of WebNumericEdit it is fired when the empty string was entered and a null value was not allowed. In the case of WebDateTimeEdit it is fired when some date fields had invalid values, but a new-suggested value was constructed.

member.name: T:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCornersType
member.summary: Type of rendering logic that is used to create rounded corners around button.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCornersType.Auto
member.summary: If the background colors and border related properties are not set and the UseBrowserDefaults is true, then FileImages with predefined image-files become enabled for WindowsXP and Macintosh user-machines.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCornersType.Disabled
member.summary: Rounded corners are disabled.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCornersType.FileImages
member.summary: Background images are used to create a rounded appearance.

remarks.p: Warning: The InternetExplorer6 may fail to load background images and button becomes transparent. That problem can not be fixed by WebImageButton.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonRoundedCornersType.BordersByTableCells
member.summary: Rounded corners are created using cells of a table. The border and background related properties are used to build rounded borders.

remarks.p: Warning: Some browsers may fail to create a TD-html-element with the size of 1x1 pixels. If it happens, then borders of a button can be distorted and have increased width.

member.name: T:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset
member.summary: WebButtonBase preset of styles.

member.summary: No change in appearance.

member.summary: Default appearance.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.Windows2000
member.summary: Microsoft Windows 2000 appearance.

member.summary: Netscape appearance and behavior.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.Mac
member.summary: Appearance similar to a button in Macintosh.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.Focus3DBorders
member.summary: Opaque background, thick 3D borders with an extra black border when the button has focus.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.Thin3DBorders
member.summary: Opaque background, standard thin 3D borders of buttons.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.Office2003ToolbarButton
member.summary: Appearance that resembles a toolbar button in Office2003: transparent in the normal state, orange background and flat borders in all other states of the button.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.VisualStudioToolbarButton
member.summary: Appearance that resembles a toolbar button in VisualStudio: transparent in the normal state, bluish background and flat borders in all other states of the button.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.VisualStudioPopUpToolbarButton
member.summary: Appearance that resembles a toolbar button in VisualStudio: transparent in the normal state, bluish background and flat borders in all other states of the button. Text and image are shifted on a mouse move and press.

member.name: F:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.ButtonStylePreset.PopUp3DBorders
member.summary: Opaque background, no borders in the normal state and pop-up borders in all other states of the button.

member.summary: Write the last part of a table that creates rounded corners. It may draw 2 TRs straight after the main TD and 2 TRs with 5 TDs.

member.summary: Event that is fired when the button was clicked. This event handler does not trigger automatic postback if AutoSubmit is false.

member.summary: Event that is fired when the button was clicked. This event handler does not trigger automatic postback if AutoSubmit is false.

member.summary: The command associated with the button.

member.summary: The command arguments associated with the button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.WebImageButton.CausesValidation
member.summary: Whether the button causes validation to fire.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.WebImageButton.RoundedCorners
member.summary: Collection of properties that are used to enable painting of rounded corners defined by background images.

remarks.p:
Warnings:
If FileImages is used (which is automatically enabled with all defaults), then the InternetExplorer6 may fail to load background images and then button becomes transparent. That problem can not be fixed by the WebImageButton.
If BordersByTableCells is used and a particular browser fails to create a TD-html-element with the size of 1x1 pixels, then borders of the button can be distorted and have increased width.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.WebImageButton.StylePreset
member.summary: Configure appearance related properties using predefined values.

remarks.p: Note: The value of this property is not written to the ViewState and, therefore, it is not persistant between sessions. However, that property modifies many other (appearance related) properties, which are persistant between sessions if the ViewState is enabled. It means that if this property is set at run time, then it will result in significant increase of the size of the hidden-view-state-field which is passed to the client.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.WebImageButton.PostBackUrl
member.summary:
Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the WebImageButton control is clicked.
Returns: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the WebImageButton control is clicked. The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

member.name: P:Infragistics.WebUI.WebDataInput.WebImageButton.ValidationGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
